commit message: Added italian localization thanks to diego.pierotto.
Added a small safeguard when writing <sat> tag
Refactored data access to conform to Android's ContentProvider mechanism. Removes some inappropriate coupling and should help for developing future features.
Display track is no updated in realtime
Delete all data after saving track.
Branching from trunk for v0.4.x (User customized buttons)
First steps to user customized button layout. Works, but is not stable.

Completed defaut layout with all buttons.
Moved special action buttons into the default layout and remove them from GpsStatusRecordLayout.
Deleted all pre-userlayout files.
Removed coupling between TrackLogger activity and TextNoteOnClickListener
Repeated 3 special action buttons on each page
Reduced coupling between UserDefinedLayoutReader and TrackLogger
Cleaning
Added support for user-customizable buttons layout
Added a recording status indicator
Included last version of IT translation thanks to diego.pierotto.
Preparing release 0.4.0
Merged from branch 0.4.x
Added screenshot for custom layouts
Added Danish translation thanks to jesperfjoelner.
Added safeguard to prevent some crashes (see issue #22)

Added support for user-customisable buttons layouts.
Start/Stop tracking is now in the application menu.
Track display is now updated in real time.
Added Italian translation thanks to diego.pierotto.
